page.title: 06Our School.
page.content: Our School was 100 years old in 1975. It is all local stone in the main building which has 5 classrooms and a small library and old toilets at the bottom of the two small playgrounds.The part facing North was built first,then the front facing St.Mary St. was added.Thirty years ago a HORSA hut was erected where many other schools sent children to have craft lessons before it became our canteen and another classroom.It is dangerous to cross the road for dinner and we have a lady watching us. We can cross over a little bridge to our playing field,the big evergreen trees make it very hot in the summer. I like this building,but we do not have much room in the classes and the high windows mean we can never see out and sometimes we do not know it's raining.I don't like the toilets.
